Class WireConnectionLine

java.lang.Object
  io.qt.internal.QSignalEmitterInternal
      io.qt.QSignalEmitter
          io.qt.QtJambiObject
              io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsLineItem
                  edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.browser.WireConnectionLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsItemInterface, io.qt.QtJambiInterface
public class WireConnectionLine
extends io.qt.widgets.QGraphicsLineItem

This class is used with the DeviceBrowser to draw wire connections on the array of tiles.

Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Nov 26, 2010
